title: Youtube drives increase in paying readers as Novara Media nears 15,000 donors
description: Craig Gent told Press Gazette that despite the cost of living crisis, 2023 was Novara Media's strongest year for supporter funding.

title: Bereaved Coventry parents raise cash for vital Labour room

title: Households face £100 council tax hikes in April in fresh cost of living misery
description: Local authority leaders in England are expected to make the maximum 4.99% hike to council tax in April, in a move that would slap around £100 on the average bills

title: Drew Hendry: ‘Be warned, Labour’s silence over the cost of living crisis is deafening’

title: Cycle lane in 'hell of a state' as people 'laugh' about it
description: “That is in a hell of a state. It’s full of litter, it’s full of leaves, it’s not maintained even if cyclists wanted to cycle along there. The laugh of the populous is spot the cyclist, nobody uses it. Surely this money from the Liverpool City Region could be better invested to get people more active.”
